amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $150 million for grants in connection with a second round of the empowerment zones program in urban areas designated by the Housing Secretary in FY 1999; and to provide $15 million for grants in connection with a second round of the empowerment zones program in urban areas designated by the Agriculture Secretary, to remain available until expended.

action.text: Mr. Walsh raised a point of order against the Meek (FL) amendment (A010). Mr. Walsh stated that the amendment provided new budget authority and exceeded the relevant allocation and as such, violated the Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
